page.title: 08EAST MERSEA'S SHOP
page.content: The village shop is the main shop in East Mersea and it sells many day to day foodstuffs and items,such as meat,eggs,cheese,milk,bread and papers.It sells some produce from a nearby farm. Although the shop has been there for some time it has been under the present management for only two years. The shop is popular and well used by local residents and there are many more customers in the summer from the nearby caravan site. Only three people are employed there at present but there are plans to expand in the future and extend the shop so that it could carry a greater stock.
